title: Collaborative Learning-Based Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level mathematics knowledge (equations, functions, geometry, etc.)
context.additional_context: Re-education program for the general public, emphasizing collaborative problem-solving of real-life mathematical challenges.

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems by utilizing role division and communication strategies in collaborative learning.
Learners can enhance critical thinking skills by revising and supplementing solutions based on peer feedback.
Learners can complete project outcomes by utilizing three or more collaborative learning tools (e.g., digital whiteboards, shared documents).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
